examples: Front-facing 'invisible' action-cam on a skydiver in freefall above bright clouds; camera locked on his face. He speaks over the wind with clear lipsync: 'This is insanely fun! You've got to try itâ€”book a tandem and go!' Natural wind roar, voice close-mic'd and slightly compressed so it's intelligible. Midday sun, goggles and jumpsuit flutter, altimeter visible, parachute rig on shoulders. Energetic but stable framing with subtle shake; brief horizon roll. End on first tug of canopy and wind noise dropping.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video you want to generate

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video
aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio

resolution.description: The resolution of the generated video
resolution.title: Resolution

duration.description: Duration of the generated video in seconds
duration.title: Duration

delete_video.description: Whether to delete the video after generation for privacy reasons. If True, the video cannot be used for remixing and will be permanently deleted.
delete_video.title: Delete Video

image_url.description: The URL of the image to use as the first frame
image_url.title: Image URL
